name: Make Them Dash
description:
An amazing cooperative game in which your coordination and skills will be proved.

You will have to play cooperatively with a friend to end the levels helping each other and making sure not to get burned on laser!

Members

Alejandro Rozados Belda - Designer

Ignacio García Olavide - Art 

Rubén Jover Cabezuelo - Programmer

_______________________________________________________

CREATIVE STATEMENT

  • Easy to play but hard to master 
  • Try error game 
  • Frustration control 
  • Cooperative 
  • Horizontal scroll
  • Pixel art 

OUR GOALS

  • Implement more animations
  • More characters 
  • Include four levels 
  • Include timer and single player scoreboard
  • Mobile version
